segments.text: I see a woman standing by the sink, completely absorbed in drying a plate.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her expression is calm, almost serene, as if nothing unusual is happening around her.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: But then I notice the sink overflowing with water, cascading down onto the floor.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It’s surprising that she doesn’t react to the growing puddle at her feet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can’t help but feel a twinge of anxiety for her; she’s completely unaware of the mess.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The outside world through the window looks so peaceful, in stark contrast to the chaos inside.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder if she ever takes a moment to look outside, to see the garden.
segments.speaker: PAR
